channel.title: Port forwarding and/or no-ip?
channel.description: do i need to use no-ip in order to let others join my server? Never had to on BF3 servers, mc servers, or bf2 servers so im just not sure if this 1 is any different.

item.title: Port forwarding and/or no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

[quote=“Nathan R, post:2, topic:430181”]Requirements to make a server

Common Sense
No-ip
Computer portforwarded
The ability to change a clients IP[/quote]

actually port fowarding is not required if your experienced enough. Thats to save the time getting ddosed by fat geeks.

Read full topic
